name: Goupil G4
keyboard: Separated full-stroke keyboard, 83 keys  with 10 functions keys and numeric keypad
text: 25 lines x 40 / 80 chars Monochrome hercules mode or colour CGA mode
graphics: 640 x 400 monochrome hercules mode  320 / 640 x 200 CGA mode
description:
The G4 computer represents the real entry of the S.M.T. Goupil company in the professional computers world. The time of the craft period with systems intended for a small circle of computers hobbyists and teachers is over. With the G4, the french manufacturer clearly affirms his will to quickly penetrate the companies and administrations market.

The future will show that this new positioning will be successfull, partly thanks to the qualities of the G4 : modern and fast microprocessor, full compatibility with IBM standard, but also thanks to a dynamic and coherent european marketing policy.

advert.description: <br><font color="red"><strong>> ADVERT #1</strong></font><br><blockquote>A pretty secretary, a clean office with nice colours, and a computer working without any printer, cables, disks... Does it really sound realistic to you ?!</blockquote>

hardwareDescription:
Optional peripherals and accessories
- GoupilNet local area network (MS-Net and OmniNet compatible).
builtInGames: One or Two 5.25'' 360 Ko. disk-drives, optional hard-disk
media: One or Two 5.25'' 360 Ko. disk-drives, optional hard-disk
